system.description: Terrifying sentinels of heavy metal armor that use shields to devastate Enemies. Vanguards are mobile bastions of fortitude and might.

features.name: Stalwart
features.description: You gain the Protector Perk and, when you take the Hold Action, you can use the held Action or Move as late as the end of your next Turn.

features.name: Guard
features.description: Once per Round, you can try to Shove a Close Target (no Action) when they become Close to you, or if you successfully Block their Attack.

features.name: Rampant Charge
features.description: You can push Targets you Shove ahead of you while you Move during the same Turn, shoving it Prone when you stop or push it into an occupied space. If you push it into an occupied space, it deals your weapon's damage to the Target and whatever occupied the space.

features.name: Unstoppable
features.description: If you use Rampant Charge and push a Being into another Being, you can make another shove attempt to push the additional Being ahead of you as well.

features.name: Wall II
features.description: You are now considered Huge for Shoves.

features.name: Indestructible
features.description: While you aren't Incapacitated and have an Armor Rating of 1 or more, you are Immune to Physical damage.
